ComicInfo.Summary:
Command Performance: Hellboy tries to stop a monster theatre troupe from killing their fans.
Friday: Liz Sherman and Abe Sapien fight with a monster in an aquarium.
My Vacation in Hell: Spoof story about Hellboy taking a vacation in Hell.
Doc Hollow's Grand Vibro-Destructo Machine Episode 6:: Lobster Johnson and his assistant try to stop the Nazis from escaping with the vibro-destructo machine.
ComicInfo.Teams: Angels,Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense
